about_the_game:
Welcome to Tea Talk Tea Talk

A unique world of text adventure, the game takes you deep into every corner of life, experiencing those you may be familiar with or unfamiliar scenes, every interaction is full of unknowns and surprises.


In this game, you will face various challenges and opportunities in life. Whether it's a casual conversation with a friend or a chance encounter with a stranger, you have the opportunity to choose how you respond. You can choose to respond with kindness and understanding, or you can choose to be cold or even harsh, and your choice will directly affect your relationship with others.



"Tea Talk" is not only a game, but also a platform for you to reflect on yourself and understand others. Through the game, you will learn how to choose the appropriate response in different situations, how to stay calm in conflict, and how to build deep friendships in communication.


The game uses concise and in-depth text descriptions that allow you to fully immerse yourself in each scene. Every detail has been carefully polished to bring you the most authentic and moving gaming experience.
Now, let's walk into "Tea Talk" together and start a text adventure about life and human nature! Here, every choice you make will leave a deep echo and become a precious memory that you can't forget in your life.
